name: Fiendskin
description: The forces of darkness gird you against the light.
benefit: You gain defensive abilities related to your patron’s outsider subtype. For example, if your patron is a devil, the abilities listed below tie into the devil subtype (see Creature Subtypes, starting on page 310 of the Pathfinder RPG Bestiary). These benefits tie to your patron’s subtype, not your specific patron (its abilities might differ from the norm).
